title: Bitten
description: When Ally becomes a newly single woman, she is determined to meet the man of her dreams. Never truly expecting it to actually occur, she is amaze to find herself drawn to a dark, mysterious stranger leaning against the bar. He was utterly irresistible.Despite her friendsâ€™ protests, she willingly follows him outside the bar and soon realizes that her world will never be the same again.
author: Merrill Gemus
